entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then a few showers. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
